page.description: Returns the Page_Number of the tab page that is visible.
page.discussion: The .TAB_GET() method returns the Page_Number of the tab page that is visible. Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example shows that the second page of the tabbed control is currently visible.
section.example: dim ptr as P dim fld as P ptr = form.load("customerx") ptr.show() fld = ptr.child("TABBED1") ? fld.Tab_Get() = 2.000000
